Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


> The pits flashed as a spirit broke free. It had been a long time coming but 
> finally.....the king had returned. But for now only in spark form for his 
> body was yet to be rebuilt. He already had a minion working on it now. He 
> knew what was to come first his way must come through the way of the blood 
> of 
> hero's. And not just any hero's.......specially picked ones to bring him 
> back 
> whole. He set his mind to Hot Rod's. Horrible images of bots being tortured 
> destroyed the most unthinkable was flashing through the brain of Hot Rod 
> now. 
> Then it just stopped. Blackness and three little voices of what seemed like 
> children screamed out. "He's coming!" Then the images would flash for a few 
> more minutes then be gone as sudden as they came. The  dark spark hovered 
> over the planet...waiting.....



--part1_11f.3046d95.28a54c58_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
